tavern.name: The Red Dragon Tavern
tavern.description: A warm, bustling tavern filled with the smell of roasted meat and ale. Wooden tables are scattered throughout, occupied by travelers and locals sharing stories. A large fireplace crackles in the corner.
available_actions: Listen to rumors from other patrons

dark_forest.name: The Dark Forest
dark_forest.description: Ancient trees tower overhead, their thick canopy blocking most sunlight. The air is damp and filled with strange sounds. Shadows seem to move between the trees, and an eerie mist clings to the ground.
available_actions: Follow the path deeper into the forest

bandit_camp.name: Bandit Camp
bandit_camp.description: A crude encampment hidden among the trees. Makeshift tents surround a central fire pit. You can see stolen goods piled near a large tent, and rough-looking bandits patrol the perimeter.

castle.name: Ironhold Castle
castle.description: Massive stone walls rise before you, topped with battlements where guards keep watch. The castle gates are flanked by iron-clad sentries. Beyond the gates, you can see a courtyard with a grand keep at its center.

town_square.name: Town Square
town_square.description: The heart of the town bustles with activity. Merchants hawk their wares, children play near a central fountain, and town criers share the latest news. Roads lead in all directions.
